title: [Self-Directed] Inquiry-Based Learning Design Utilizing Science Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Foundational Knowledge of Educational Methodologies
context.additional_context: A practice-centered learning program for pre-service elementary teachers on integrating storytelling and inquiry-based learning in science education settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods to design science-based stories that stimulate students' interest.
Learners can conduct classes promoting understanding of scientific concepts by creating inquiry activity worksheets utilizing storytelling.
Learners can propose three or more hybrid digital/analog storytelling strategies applicable in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
